Tom Emerson wrote:

> stack writes:
> > options surts-source-file, seeds-as-surt-prefixes, and surts-dump-file
> > (I'll try and move them up in the page -- one of the lads here asked 
> for
> > that a while ago). They follow transitiveFilter but are before
> > http-headers in the order file.
> [...]
>
> Good lord, I completely missed these. And here I was thinking that I
> had scanned all of the entries on the page. Even not moving them in
> the WUI but documenting their existence would make life easier for
> people. :-)

Sorry about that Tom.  I added a note under 'surtprefixscope' that says:

'When you use this scope, it adds 3 hard-to-find-in-the-UI attributes -- 
surts-source-file, seeds-as-surt-prefixes, and surts-dump-file -- to the 
end of the scope section, just after transitiveFilter but before 
http-headers. Use these attributes to configure the SURT scope.'

(Moving them up the page will take a bit of work so I gave up on it for 
now).
St.Ack

> Thanks.
